short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful extension created to get rid of your Double Clicking problems!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double Click Guard is a user-friendly software application for anyone suffering from double clicks! Designed to block accidental double clicks, providing a seamless and frustration-free user experience. This handy utility is a must-have for anyone who regularly interacts with computers and devices, as it eliminates the annoying consequences of unintentional double clicks.
